thread.title: NEVILLE KRETZMANN
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by NEVILLE KRETZMANN

author: NEVILLE KRETZMANN
title: NEVILLE KRETZMANN
text: I was very satisfied with my purchase from Brushy Mountain of the book "Common Honey Bee Diseases". Their ad promised that this was a book that contained enlarged photographs showing examples of common bee diseases. When the book arrived about a week later, that is exactly what it was.
